StoredProcedureOraclev10g.name: UPDATELAB
StoredProcedureOraclev10g.source: CREATE OR REPLACE PROCEDURE GRUPO10.UPDATELAB(pOldNum IN VARCHAR2, pBuildingCode IN VARCHAR, pNewNum IN VARCHAR2, &lt;br/&gt; pLabCapacity IN NUMBER, pLabEquipment IN Equipment_list) AS&lt;br/&gt;BEGIN &lt;br/&gt; UPDATE Lab_table lab&lt;br/&gt; SET lab.buildingCode = pBuildingCode,&lt;br/&gt; lab.labNumber = pNewNum,&lt;br/&gt; lab.labCapacity = pLabCapacity,&lt;br/&gt; lab.labEquipment = pLabEquipment&lt;br/&gt; WHERE lab.labNumber = pOldNum;&lt;br/&gt;END updateLab;
